thread.section_title: AutoLendersGo Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of AutoLendersGo | autolendersgo.com
thread.title: Alex

author: Alex
title: Alex
text: I emailed request at 8am on monday morning.got a call back at 9am.set up appointment to come to my house. Assessor arrived prior to scheduled appointment time but called first to confirm if ok. He assessed car and made offer. I accepted and he wrote a check on the spot by 12:30pm. I cashed the check that afternoon and car was picked up the next day from my driveway without my presence. Seamless experience
